channel.title: Touchpad to screen conversion
channel.description:
Seeing as the UI for Windows 8 is designed for touch devices, I was wondering if it was possible to map points touched on my touchpad to points on the screen.
Here is an image form the settings of my touchpad which shows that it would be possible to find the point within the touchpad square, the only problem would be getting that point and multiplying the coords to match my screen resolution.
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=566365.0;attach=21748;image[/img] (the arrows on the edge point to the spot where my finger is)
Has any one done/seen something like this before?

item.title: Touchpad to screen conversion
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Im assuming 5888,4864 is the area on your trackpad? so you would just need to translate that to pixel coordinates

Read full topic

item.title: Touchpad to screen conversion
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:2, topic:463069”]http://java.net/projects/java-synaptics/sources/svn/show/trunk/source?rev=37

Quite old but might be of use, I haven’t had time to look at the API properly though so it could just be a dead end.[/quote]

Compiled it, and it seems to work, although the positions returned are pretty weird. Here is some testing output:

Oct 05, 2012 7:46:55 PM net.kano.jsynaptics.DeviceManager getInstance
INFO: Loaded java-synaptics native library
Oct 05, 2012 7:46:55 PM net.kano.jsynaptics.InstanceManager$InstanceManagerThread makeDeviceManager
INFO: Created device manager at 0x51ed28
Device Count: 1
Oct 05, 2012 7:46:55 PM net.kano.jsynaptics.InstanceManager$InstanceManagerThread makeDevice
INFO: Created device #0 at 0x521668
Oct 05, 2012 7:46:55 PM net.kano.jsynaptics.InstanceManager$InstanceManagerThread makePacket
INFO: Created packet at 0x521668
Device[0] : TouchPadPS2
Device[0].range : Area [1024,1024 -> 5888,4864]
Device[0].xResolution : 1422
Device[0].yResolution : 2667
Packet ID: 218649
Packet[218649].timestamp : 6993616
Packet[218649].buttonState : []
Packet[218649].rawPosition : Position (4625,2277) pressure=54 width=4
Packet[218649].positionDeltas : Position (33,-114) pressure=0 width=0
Packet[218649].filteredPosition : Position (4592,2391) pressure=52 width=4
Packet[218649].fingerState : [FINGER_IN_PROXIMITY, FINGER_TOUCHING, POSSIBLE_TAP, SOME_FINGER_MOTION, FINGER_MOVING]

Read full topic
